message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its value exceeds $12000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. To ensure we reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose an initial offer of $15000 for the product. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Please let me know if this is something we can work with.
